{{Infobox Oak Item |name = EXP Share |image = |caption = Artwork of the ''EXP Share''. |dex = 50 |effect = Gain more EXP from Battling }} == Details == ===Description=== Gain more EXP from Battling ===Acquisition=== Catch 50 Unique Pokémon. ===Effects=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect |- |0 || x1.15 EXP Earned |- |1 || x1.18 EXP Earned |- |2 || x1.21 EXP Earned |- |3 || x1.24 EXP Earned |- |4 || x1.27 EXP Earned |- |5/Max || x1.3 EXP Earned |- |} ===Upgrade Requirements=== Level 0 to 1 500 defeated Pokémon and 50,000 Pokedollars Level 1 to 2 500 defeated Pokémon and 100,000 Pokedollars Level 2 to 3 1500 defeated Pokémon and 250,000 Pokedollars Level 3 to 4 2500 defeated Pokémon and 500,000 Pokedollars Level 4 to 5 5000 defeated Pokémon and 1,000,000 Pokedollars {{Oak items}}
